text: With some savings, a man from a village in India bought a young donkey. The person who sold it to him prevented him from getting the amount of food he had to get every day. But the new owner thought that such a quantity was excessive and began to subtract food from the chicken daily. So much so that the donkey's food ration decreased that one day the poor animal died. Then the man began to murmur and lament, "Woe to you! What a fate! If you'd given me a little more time before I died, I would have gotten him used to not eating anything at all. FIN
title: Si hubiera tenido un poco más de tiempo
author: nan Anónimo
